data.name: Groups_GroupEdit_ErrorSave
data.value: An error has occured while trying to save this group. Please check all values and try again.

data.name: Groups_GroupEdit_PrivacyLegend
data.value:
All users can join open groups and invite others to join. Anyone can see the group information and content.
Administrators of closed groups must approve requests for new members. All users can see group descriptions, but only members can see the group content (wall posts, uploaded files, ...).

data.name: PeopleSearch_ConfirmationMailContent
data.value:
Hi {FriendName},

{UserName} has added you as a friend on {ApplicationName}. We need to confirm that you know {UserName} in order for you to be friends on our Web site.
{PersonalMessage}

To confirm this request, please click on the following link:
{ConfirmationUrl}

Best regards,

{ApplicationName} Team
